rich-presence-001.description:
A drop-in alternative to the Archipelago Text Client with identical functionality, but with Discord Rich Presence support when you connect to a slot. That's it!

**Features**

Game and Location Check Status
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/07c46581-2feb-4cac-80d6-7370c41bfdab)

Game Covers (For 200+ supported AND unsupported APWorlds)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4590b4bb-770f-4945-b84f-1a33f76b163e)

Last Location Checked
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4491ba4d-a588-4a83-a0fa-21c626c538de)

Multiworld Size
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/24f7a78e-108c-4553-92a9-f4669c9a18c6)
rich-presence-001.title: Discord Rich Presence Client - Release #1

rich-presence-002.description:
* Don't show anything in rich presence when the client is open but not connected.
* Now able to properly display 0 / XXX for a fresh seed (Used to be limited to start at 1 / XXX)
* Added game cover support for 37 new APWorlds
* The client should no longer freeze if you close Discord while it is running

**Discord Rich Presence Client**

A drop-in alternative to the Archipelago Text Client with identical functionality, but with Discord Rich Presence support when you connect to a slot. That's it!

**Features**

Game and Location Check Status
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/07c46581-2feb-4cac-80d6-7370c41bfdab)

Game Covers (For 250+ supported AND unsupported APWorlds)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4590b4bb-770f-4945-b84f-1a33f76b163e)

Last Location Checked
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4491ba4d-a588-4a83-a0fa-21c626c538de)

Multiworld Size
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/24f7a78e-108c-4553-92a9-f4669c9a18c6)
rich-presence-002.title: Discord Rich Presence Client - Release #2

rich-presence-003.description:
* Added game cover support for 90+ new APWorlds
* Removed game covers for a handful of less popular / known games (Discord has a limit of 300 art assets)
* Added manifest for Archipelago 0.7.0+ support

**Discord Rich Presence Client**

A drop-in alternative to the Archipelago Text Client with identical functionality, but with Discord Rich Presence support when you connect to a slot. That's it!

**Features**

Game and Location Check Status
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/07c46581-2feb-4cac-80d6-7370c41bfdab)

Game Covers (For ~300 supported AND unsupported APWorlds)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4590b4bb-770f-4945-b84f-1a33f76b163e)

Last Location Checked
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4491ba4d-a588-4a83-a0fa-21c626c538de)

Multiworld Size
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/24f7a78e-108c-4553-92a9-f4669c9a18c6)
rich-presence-003.title: Discord Rich Presence Client - Release #3
